</li>
<li id="cite_note-Kon-26"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Kon_26-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Kon_26-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFKoneczny1903" class="citation book">Koneczny, Feliks (1903). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/dziejepolskizaj00konegoog"><i>Dzieje polski za Jagiellonow</i></a> (in Polish). Kraków: Nakładem Krakowskiego Towarzystwa Oświaty Ludowej. p.&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/dziejepolskizaj00konegoog/page/n138">123</a>. <a href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/123147077">123147077</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Dzieje+polski+za+Jagiellonow&amp;rft.place=Krak%C3%B3w&amp;rft.pages=123&amp;rft.pub=Nak%C5%82adem+Krakowskiego+Towarzystwa+O%C5%9Bwiaty+Ludowej&amp;rft.date=1903&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F123147077&amp;rft.aulast=Koneczny&amp;rft.aufirst=Feliks&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fdziejepolskizaj00konegoog&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Rogalski-27"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Rogalski_27-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFRogalski1846" class="citation book">Rogalski, Leon (1846). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=UhgLAAAAIAAJ&amp;pg=PA210"><i>Dzieje Krzyżaków: oraz ich stosunki z Polska̜, Litwa̜ i Prussami</i></a> (in Polish). <b>II</b>. Warsaw: Nakł. i drukiem S. Orgelbranda. p.&nbsp;210. <a href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/38718035">38718035</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Dzieje+Krzy%C5%BCak%C3%B3w%3A+oraz+ich+stosunki+z+Polska%CC%9C%2C+Litwa%CC%9C+i+Prussami&amp;rft.place=Warsaw&amp;rft.pages=210&amp;rft.pub=Nak%C5%82.+i+drukiem+S.+Orgelbranda&amp;rft.date=1846&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F38718035&amp;rft.aulast=Rogalski&amp;rft.aufirst=Leon&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DUhgLAAAAIAAJ%26pg%3DPA210&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-WIEM-28"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-WIEM_28-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://portalwiedzy.onet.pl/71706,,,,wojny_polsko_krzyzackie,haslo.html">"Wojny polsko-krzyżackie"</a> (in Polish). <a href="/wiki/Encyklopedia_WIEM" class="mw-redirect" title="Encyklopedia WIEM">Encyklopedia WIEM</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">2008-07-03</span></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Wojny+polsko-krzy%C5%BCackie&amp;rft.pub=Encyklopedia+WIEM&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fportalwiedzy.onet.pl%2F71706%2C%2C%2C%2Cwojny_polsko_krzyzackie%2Chaslo.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-u311-29"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-u311_29-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-u311_29-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFUrban2003" class="citation book">Urban, William (2003). <i>Tannenberg and After</i>. Chicago: <a href="/wiki/Lithuanian_Research_and_Studies_Center" title="Lithuanian Research and Studies Center">Lithuanian Research and Studies Center</a>. p.&nbsp;311. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/0-929700-25-2" title="Special:BookSources/0-929700-25-2"><bdi>0-929700-25-2</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Tannenberg+and+After&amp;rft.place=Chicago&amp;rft.pages=311&amp;rft.pub=Lithuanian+Research+and+Studies+Center&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft.isbn=0-929700-25-2&amp;rft.aulast=Urban&amp;rft.aufirst=William&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-piro-30"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-piro_30-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFPiročkinas1999" class="citation journal">Piročkinas, Arnoldas (1999). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110515185857/http://ausis.gf.vu.lt/mg/nr/99/10/10kar.html">"Žygimantas Kaributaitis – tragiško likimo asmenybė"</a>. <i>Mokslas ir gyvenimas</i> (in Lithuanian). <b>10</b> (502). <a href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0134-3084">0134-3084</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-curtin-31"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-curtin_31-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFCurtin1908" class="citation book">Curtin, Jeremiah (1908). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/mongolsinrussia02curtgoog"><i>The Mongols in Russia</i></a>. Little Brown. p.&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/mongolsinrussia02curtgoog/page/n460">427</a>. <a href="/wiki/OCLC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="OCLC (identifier)">OCLC</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/oclc/1314175">1314175</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Mongols+in+Russia&amp;rft.pages=427&amp;rft.pub=Little+Brown&amp;rft.date=1908&amp;rft_id=info%3Aoclcnum%2F1314175&amp;rft.aulast=Curtin&amp;rft.aufirst=Jeremiah&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fmongolsinrussia02curtgoog&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-el-32"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-el_32-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-el_32-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-el_32-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFSužiedėlis1970–1978" class="citation encyclopaedia">Sužiedėlis, Simas, ed. </li>
<li id="cite_note-kamun-33"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-kamun_33-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFKamuntavičiusKamuntavičienėCivinskasAntanaitis2001" class="citation book">Kamuntavičius, Rūstis; Kamuntavičienė, Vaida; Civinskas, Remigijus; Antanaitis, Kastytis (2001). <i>Lietuvos istorija 11–12 klasėms</i> (in Lithuanian). <li id="cite_note-dundu-34"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-dundu_34-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFDundulis2004" class="citation encyclopaedia">Dundulis, Bronius (2004). </li>
<li id="cite_note-u313-35"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-u313_35-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFUrban2003" class="citation book">Urban, William (2003). <i>Tannenberg and After</i>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-concise-36"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-concise_36-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-concise_36-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite id="CITEREFLukowskiZawadzki2001" class="citation book">Lukowski, Jerzy; Zawadzki, Hubert (2001). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=NpMxTvBuWHYC&amp;pg=PA38"><i>A concise history of Poland</i></a>. <a href="/wiki/Cambridge_University_Press" title="Cambridge University Press">Cambridge University Press</a>. p.&nbsp;38. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-521-55917-1" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-521-55917-1"><bdi>978-0-521-55917-1</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=A+concise+history+of+Poland&amp;rft.pages=38&amp;rft.pub=Cambridge+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-521-55917-1&amp;rft.aulast=Lukowski&amp;rft.aufirst=Jerzy&amp;rft.au=Zawadzki%2C+Hubert&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DNpMxTvBuWHYC%26pg%3DPA38&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></span>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">Further reading</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Lithuanian_Civil_War_(1432%E2%80%931438)&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: Further reading">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><cite id="CITEREFGrodeckiZachorowskiDąbrowski1995" class="citation book">Grodecki, Roman; Zachorowski, Stanisław; Dąbrowski, Jan (1995) [1926]. <i>Dzieje Polski Średniowiecznej</i> (in Polish). <b>2</b>. Kraków: Wydawnictwo Platan. pp.&nbsp;103–125. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/83-7052-230-0" title="Special:BookSources/83-7052-230-0"><bdi>83-7052-230-0</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Dzieje+Polski+%C5%9Aredniowiecznej&amp;rft.place=Krak%C3%B3w&amp;rft.pages=103-125&amp;rft.pub=Wydawnictwo+Platan&amp;rft.date=1995&amp;rft.isbn=83-7052-230-0&amp;rft.aulast=Grodecki&amp;rft.aufirst=Roman&amp;rft.au=Zachorowski%2C+Stanis%C5%82aw&amp;rft.au=D%C4%85browski%2C+Jan&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></li>
<li><cite id="CITEREFBiskupLabuda1986" class="citation book">Biskup, Marian; Labuda, Gerard (1986). <i>Dzieje zakonu krzyżackiego w Prusach</i> (in Polish). Gdańsk: Wydawnictwo Morskie.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Dzieje+zakonu+krzy%C5%BCackiego+w+Prusach&amp;rft.place=Gda%C5%84sk&amp;rft.pub=Wydawnictwo+Morskie&amp;rft.date=1986&amp;rft.aulast=Biskup&amp;rft.aufirst=Marian&amp;rft.au=Labuda%2C+Gerard&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALithuanian+Civil+War+%281432%E2%80%931438%29" class="Z3988"></span><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r951705291"></li></ul>

<li><a href="/wiki/Galicia%E2%80%93Volhynia_Wars" title="Galicia–Volhynia Wars">Galicia–Volhynia Wars</a></li></ul>
</div></td><td class="navbox-image" rowspan="8" style="width:1px;padding:0px 0px 0px 2px"><div><div class="plainlist">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/File:POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg" class="image"><img alt="POL Wojska Lądowe.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/84/POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg/50px-POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg.png" decoding="async" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/84/POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg/75px-POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/84/POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg/100px-POL_Wojska_L%C4%85dowe.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="1061" width="50" height="71"></a></li></ul>
<p><br>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/File:POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg" class="image"><img alt="POL Marynarka Wojenna.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b1/POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg/50px-POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg.png" decoding="async" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b1/POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg/75px-POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b1/POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg/100px-POL_Marynarka_Wojenna.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="567" data-file-height="800" width="50" height="71"></a></li></ul>
<p><br>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/File:POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg" class="image"><img alt="POL Wojska Lotnicze.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6d/POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg/50px-POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg.png" decoding="async" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6d/POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg/75px-POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6d/POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg/100px-POL_Wojska_Lotnicze.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="744" data-file-height="939" width="50" height="63"></a></li></ul>
</div></div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%;background-color:#DCDCDC;"><a href="/wiki/History_of_Poland_during_the_Jagiellonian_dynasty" title="History of Poland during the Jagiellonian dynasty">Jagiellon Poland</a></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

century in Lithuania</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Civil_wars_of_the_Middle_Ages" title="Category:Civil wars of the Middle Ages">Civil wars of the Middle Ages</a></li><li><a
